summary: 1999  was a common year starting on Friday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Barry Winchell  was an infantry soldier in the United States Army, whose murder by a fellow soldier, Calvin Glover, became a point of reference in the ongoing debate about the policy known as "Don't ask, don't tell", which did not allow U.S. military gays, bisexuals, and lesbians to be open about their sexual orientation. .
title: Barry Winchell
